client-settings.name: 神戸ハーバーランド株式会社

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto !important;} body:lang(en) { letter-spacing: normal } #love_catch:lang(en) { top: 200px; } #love_description:lang(en) {top: 258px;} #fr_catch:lang(en) { top: 200px;} #fr_description:lang(en) { top: 255px; width: 350px; } .fa { line-height: inherit; } @media screen and (min-width: 1000px) { #ft-nav:lang(en) { width: 620px;} #ft-nav ul li a:lang(en) { width: 200px; } .header-utility h1 { padding: 0.5%;} } @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) { #site-translate-message { text-align: left; padding: 0.5% 1%;} #ft-nav li a:lang(en) { font-size: 82% }}
